Spa Scriptions Metallic Wash Off Mask

Brand: Spa Scriptions

Category: Mask

Ingredients: AQUA/WATER/EAU, GLYCERIN, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, MICA, TITANIUM DIOXIDE/CI 77891, PAEONIA ALBIFLORA ROOT EXTRACT, MARIS SAL, SODIUM BICARBONATE, CARBOMER, TRIETHANOLAMINE, DIAMOND POWDER, DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, IODOPROPYNYL BUTYLCARBAMATE.

Ing

BUTYLCARBAMATE.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Cancer; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
